verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A man is no fool to give what he cannot keep,
In order to gain what he cannot lose.
A man is no fool to give what he cannot keep,
In order to gain what he cannot lose. (2x).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A man is no fool to give and give and give,
To give and give and give and give and give.
A man is no fool to give what he cannot keep,
In order to gain what he cannot lose.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Necio no es el que da lo que no puede guardar,
Para ganar lo que no se puede perder(2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Necio no es el que da y da y da,
Que da y da y da y da y da,
Necio no es el que da lo que no puede guardar,
Para ganar lo que no se puede perder.
